text: Kana An-Nasu 'Ummatan Wahidatan Faba`atha Allahu An-Nabiyina Mubashirina Wa Mundhirina Wa 'Anzala Ma`ahumu Al-Kitaba Bil-Haqqi Liyahkuma Bayna An-Nasi Fima Akhtalafu Fihi Wa Ma Akhtalafa Fihi 'Illa Al-Ladhina 'Utuhu Min Ba`di Ma Ja'at/humu Al-Bayyinatu Baghyaan Baynahum Fahada Allahu Al-Ladhina 'Amanu Lima Akhtalafu Fihi Mina Al-Haqqi Bi'idhnihi Wa Allahu Yahdi Man Yasha'u 'Ila Siratin Mustaqimin
